oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Banner Soapbox Derby, Nashville, Tennessee, 1937
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: A scene from the 1937 Nashville Banner Soap Box Derby, sponsored by the Banner newspaper and Chevrolet. The young race drivers designed and built their own soap box derby cars. This competitive event was held on Shelby Avenue with its hill. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
